form.official-title: To make technical changes clarifying section 502 of the Federal Credit Reform Act of 1990.

section.header: Technical changes with respect to definition of direct loan
section.text: Section 502(1) of the Federal Credit Reform Act of 1990 (2 U.S.C. 661a(1)) is amended by striking or the price support loans of the Commodity Credit Corporation and inserting , the price support loans of the Commodity Credit Corporation, or a loan made by another lender or financing arrangements that defer payment for 90 days or fewer.
